Articles.Content:
I just discovered that you can get missions to ferry tourists to a station for a few days. If they are in Kerbol orbit, even very close to Kerbin the rewards are huge.

So I put a station with lot of crew space just slightly ahead of Kerbin in same orbit, which I can reach in about 7 days with less than 1500 m/s ∆v and waited for a contract. It came: 10 tourists, 34 days: over 80 000 000 funds !

After digging around I found that a viewing cupola make getting these kind of contracts more likely. For the desired destination to qualify as a base you need antenna, power generation and docking port as listed in every construct base contract.

Edited October 12, 2019 by CBase
